info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hardin County through 315 PM CDT... At 230 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Silsbee to near Thicket. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Kountze, Saratoga, Thicket, Caney Head, Batson, Votaw, Honey Island and Village Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
